body: r_c sits all night at m_c's vigil, struggling to cling to comfort {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} once felt with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit at {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} side.

r_c feels {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} world shift under {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} feet at the loss of m_c. All the warmth, security, and love that {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit brought to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} life is taken away in an instant.
The world seemed brighter and warmer to r_c with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit by {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} side, and {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} never imagined m_c would be taken first.
r_c can't put into words how much comfort and joy m_c brought to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} life from the first moment {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} laid eyes on {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.
The vigil is impossible for r_c to sit through in its entirety. Without {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit, m_c, the world is bleak.
r_c treasured the easy, companionable silences with m_c that only kin can share. Now, the silence of death fills the air between r_c and {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit.
